Thank you to those who bid on my book auctions. I've
relisted two of them.

I have also decided to offer up the 2 Vol. Shinto &
Koto Taikan by Kawaguchi to the lists before I put it
on eBay. Price is $375 + shipping. Interested
individuals, please contact me privately.
____________________________

Still in fund-raising and spring cleaning mode, I have
sold one, and still offer out 3 iron tsuba for sale:

http://tinyurl.com/yvqosa

Interested individuals please contact me privately and
ask for more photos.

sincerely,

Curran
